text: Match 0 to 100 or 0% to 100% using regex
I'm trying to match the following, and i'm having a difficult time doing so.
I want to allow 0 to 100, or 0% to 100%.
In my textfield, i strip the % out, so if they put in 100, it won't fail at the regex and skip the strip.
Therefore, i'd need a regex to allow 0 to 100 or 0% to 100%.
Any help would be greatly appreciated.
